newsitem.title: SPAIN: Uralita sees 1997 net profit at 4 bln ptas.
newsitem.headline: Uralita sees 1997 net profit at 4 bln ptas.

text.p: Spanish building material firm Uralita is expecting a 1997 net profit of around 4.0 billion pesetas, versus 2.2 billion in 1996, managing director Eugenio Ruiz-Galvez said on Thursday, local news agency EFE reported.
Galvez told reporters in Barcelona that 1997 turnover should be over 140 billion pesetas, versus 134 billion in 1996.
He said the company also expected to see a recovery in the building sector and a better performance in the health division, which posted 1996 losses of 1.3 billion pesetas.
